title: Can the M635 be connected to a PC for copying contacts and messages to the PC or for editing and sending messages through the PCï¼Ÿ
answer:
No, no the PC Suite is provided with the M635.
You can backup contacts by selecting Contacts -> Options -> Manage Contacts -> Back Up to Memory Card.
Contacts can be sent via Bluetooth by selecting Contacts -> Options -> Send Multiple -> Via Bluetooth.
